Entries.Lumisteria.SpecialOrders.GuntherMinerals: {Text}. 25 minerals of any kind will do. Please drop them off at the museum counter!   - Gunther
Place the minerals in the drop box at the museum counter.
One of my colleague wants some specimen to study the minerals the valley can offer.
A scientific project is collecting minerals for experiments.
Entries.Lumisteria.SpecialOrders.GusCookware_Tex: I need Clint to redo a lot of my cookware set, but he has a shortage of material. Anyone that can supply them will get a reward.    - Gus
